definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Application and detection of weak signal based on stochastic resonance;
sentences.chinese: 介绍动平衡仪中弱信号提取的门积分器的设计。

sentences.english: Non-sew roll, which is warped with wearable rubber, with dynamitic balance adjustment .
sentences.chinese: 无缝管，包裹耐磨橡胶，并做动平衡校正。

sentences.english: The dynamical balancing problem of machinery is one of the important mechanical dynamics topics.
sentences.chinese: 机构动平衡问题是机械动力学中的重要课题之一。

sentences.english: The dynamical balancing of beating-up mechanism of air - jet loom is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨一种喷气织机四连杆打纬机构的动平衡方法。

sentences.english: Two kinds of soft support and hard support for dynamic balancing machine.
sentences.chinese: 动平衡机分软支承和硬支撑两种。

sentences.english: Here to introduce the use of high-precision dynamic balancing machine which is convenient?
sentences.chinese: 下面给大家介绍一下使用高精度动平衡机有哪些便利？

sentences.english: Dynamic balance test should be carried out to the rotor of the turbocharger.
sentences.chinese: 涡轮增压器转子应进行动平衡试验。

sentences.english: The high precision dynamic balancing machine also has a lot of convenience.
sentences.chinese: 其中高精度的动平衡机还具有许多便利。

sentences.english: Guide bearing of dynamic balancing machine.
The author mentioned that the multi-functional balancing machine is a feasible and reasonably designed new product.
sentences.chinese: 此多功能动平衡机是实用性强和设计合理的新产品。

sentences.english: The dynamically balanced rotor assembly, sealed bearings with grease reserviors.
sentences.chinese: 动平衡的转子总成，具有蓄油装置的全密封轴承。

sentences.english: The device is called balancing test equipment base.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备叫动平衡试验设备底座。

sentences.english: Water Proof Motor with Aluminum Fan with pre-balance test.
sentences.chinese: 防水电机加经动平衡测试的铝合金页轮。

sentences.english: This article introduces the development on semi-automatic system of rotor dynamic balancing machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍转子动平衡机半自动化系统研制。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the possibility and superiority of the rotor balancing based on holospectrum analysis.
sentences.chinese: 分析全息谱技术应用于动平衡领域的可能性与优势。

sentences.english: Non-sew roller, with dynamitic balance adjustment, is warped with wearable rubble.
sentences.chinese: 无缝管，包裹耐磨橡胶，并做动平衡校正。
